name: Disable Next Step With Enter in Elementor Forms
author: Daniele De Rosa

sections.description:
The basic behavior of Elementor Multi-Step Forms automatically navigates the user to the next step when the ENTER key is pressed. This plugin deactivates this behavior.

You have the choice between multiple things:

  • Deactivate automatically navigating to the next step with ENTER for Input fields
  • Deactivate automatically navigating to the next step with ENTER for Textarea fields

This plugin is very lightweight and easy to use.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Disable Next Step With Enter in Elementor Forms screen to configure the plugin
  4. That’s it!
